trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Meridianville
There were no other sightings in Meridianville on or around April 9th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: Earlier tonight just around 8 pm Fri April 8, 2005; I was outside at the front of the house, to bring in the gas grill and close the garage door...As I got to the grill, I looked up to see how clear the night was going to be and it was partly cloudy but clearing pretty good. As I looked up, something caught my attention coming out of the general southeastern direction. It looked like a star but it was moving...I kept looking to see if it was a high altitude plane and I listened to try and hear the jet engine but didn t hear a thing. I then noticed the object had suddenly (it seemed) begun heading in an almost due northern pattern. It might have been a high altitude jet since I live underneath a fairly active flight zone but what I saw didn t lead me to think it was the usual aircraft. Just don t know what I saw but I definantly saw something.
